CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordTypeId, "01250000000Hd58", "Renewal", "01250000000HdeD", "Adjustment", "01250000000Hq3W", "Cancellation", IF( IsClosed, CASE(StageName, "Closed Won", "Closed Won", "Closed Lost", "Closed Lost", "Closed - No Decision", "Closed - No Decision", "Other Closed" ), IF( Probability <0.2, "Omitted", IF( Probability < 0.35, "Pipeline", IF( Probability <0.8, "Best Case", IF( Probability <1.0, "Commit", IF( Probability =1.0, "Closed", "Probability Unknown" ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Forecast Category - Actual Exp Dec 2020
